Docs.param: A file name, or "-" for standard output.
Docs.summary: Creates an RDF/XML writer that writes to the named file.
Creates an RDF/XML writer that writes to the given TextWriter.
Creates an RDF/XML writer that writes to the given XmlWriter.
Creates an RDF/XML writer that writes to the given XmlDocument.
Writes RDF statements to an RDF/XML file.

remarks.para: The RdfXmlWriter buffers the entire output document in memory, before writing the document to the stream when Close is called.

The namespaces used in the output data must be registered with the NamespaceManager in the property before the first call to Add. Failure to do so may prevent the document from being written to the stream, as not all URIs can be automatically converted into an XML qualified name.
